attributes.action: Freeze all MP's Expenses (excluding staff salaries, mortgage/rent and utilities) until the formal Review has been completed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Restrict expenses to basic living costs until the review is completed. This will save money and challenge the belief that this is owed to MPs not a privelige.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
